description: This CSS file defines styles for a React application including theme management for light and dark modes, responsive design, and button styling.

classes.name: .App
classes.description: Main application class that centers content and manages background color based on theme.

classes.name: .App-header
classes.description: Header class for the application containing styling for layout and responsiveness.

classes.name: .App-logo
classes.description: Class for application logo that includes responsive height and animation settings.

classes.name: .theme-toggle
classes.description: Class for the theme toggle button with hover and active state effects.
